segments.text: Steven , would you like to go dance with us tonight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: John , I am just not in the mood for this .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You look so upset . What's going on ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I lost the table tennis game yesterday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I just don ’ t want to play table tennis any more .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is it that bad ? It ’ s nothing more than a game .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My opponent bowled me with the very first ball . I was wondering if it's appropriate for me to play table tennis .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , come on ! Failure is the mother of success . Don ’ t lose heart . I'm sure you'll succeed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Perhaps you are right . But I still need some time to recover from the failure .
segments.speaker: S2
